addr: Tishman Auditorium, 63 Fifth Ave New York, NY 10003
title: Lang Dance Fall Production
desc: Eugene Lang College, The New School for Liberal Arts, ?home to one of the more progressive collegiate dance departments in New York?? (NY Times ), presents the Lang Dance Fall Production. Featuring works by Nami Yamamoto (Movement Research Artist-in-Residence) and Juliette Mapp, and original student works from Rebecca Stenn's Dance Making Workshop.?All works will be performed by students of the Eugene Lang College dance program. http://events.newschool.edu/DanceFall2015 ? Subscribe to our events newsletters . Founded in 1919, The New School was born out of principles of academic freedom, tolerance, and experimentation. Committed to social engagement, The New School today remains in the vanguard of innovation in higher education, with more than 10,000 undergraduate and graduate students challenging the status quo in design and the social sciences, liberal arts, management, the arts, and media. The New School welcomes thousands of adult learners annually for continuing education courses and lectures, screenings, readings, and concerts. Through its online learning portals, research institutes, and international partnerships, The New School maintains a global presence. Learn more at? www.newschool.edu .
